name: memre_api_v1_readiness
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool learning_engine.
Tool description: Easily integrate Memre adaptive learning software with your internal systems to optimize memory retention, build lasting knowledge, and create expertise.
API description: Get the readiness status of a user for a specified item from the memre API.

user_id.description: The ID of the user whose readiness status is being queried.

item_id.description: The ID of the item for which the readiness status is being queried.
